resources.string:
"Changes include:
Tablet layout • Community posts are hidden.
Automotive layout • Shorts open in the regular player. • Feed is organized by topics and channels. • Video description cannot be opened when 'Spoof streaming data' is turned off."
Background color of the server-side snackbar has not changed.
Background color of the server-side snackbar has changed.

"Some snack bars use a theme defined on the server side, not the app theme.
Change the background color of these snack bars.
If there are server-side changes, the background color of the snack bar may not change."
Type the hex code of the seekbar accent color.
Type the hex code of the seekbar primary color.
Default Shorts quality on mobile network
Default Shorts quality on Wi-Fi network

"Auto switch mix playlists is enabled when autoplay is turned on.
Autoplay can be changed in YouTube settings: Settings → Autoplay / Playback → Autoplay next video"
Auto switch mix playlists is disabled.
Enabling this feature will disable automatic switching to YouTube Mix when playing music while autoplay is turned on.
Default playback speed is enabled for music.
Default playback speed is disabled for music.
Default playback speed is disabled for videos playable on YouTube Music.
Default playback speed is disabled if the video category is Music.
Layout will be updated by the server.
Layout will not be updated by the server.

"App layout reverts to the layout it was using when it was first installed.
Some server-side layouts may not revert.
Changes include: • Components in the player flyout menu (or related settings) may not work. • Rolling numbers are not animated. • The Library tab is used. • The Music section of video description may not work. • Account switch button may not appear on the Library tab. Use the 'Enable wide search bar in You tab' setting."

Continue watching will resume on app startup.

Info:
• Continue watching is the YouTube Premium feature.
• This setting does not force Continue watching to be enabled.
Continue watching will not resume on app startup.
Chapters are enabled in the seekbar.
Chapters are disabled in the seekbar.
Fountain animation above the Like button is enabled.
Fountain animation above the Like button is disabled.
Swiping down below the player will enter fullscreen mode.
Swiping down below the player will not enter fullscreen mode.
Disable swipe to enter fullscreen mode (below the player)
Swiping up in the player will enter fullscreen mode.
Swiping up in the player will not enter fullscreen mode.
Disable swipe to enter fullscreen mode (in the player)
Swiping down in fullscreen will exit fullscreen mode.
Swiping down in fullscreen will not exit fullscreen mode.
Disable swipe to exit fullscreen mode
Swiping up / down in fullscreen mode will change to the next / previous video.
Swiping up / down in fullscreen mode will not change to the next / previous video.
For some manufacturer ROMs running Android 12+, enabling this feature may make the system navigation bar transparent.

"VP9 codec is disabled.
Info: • Maximum resolution is 1080p. • Video playback will use more internet data than VP9. • VP9 codec is still used for HDR video."

"This will restore thumbnails to live streams that do not have seekbar thumbnails.
Internet data usage may be higher, and seekbar thumbnails will have a slight delay before showing.
This feature works best with a very fast internet connection."
Custom actions are disabled in flyout menu.

"Custom actions are enabled in flyout menu.
Limitations: • Does not work with live stream."
Enable custom actions in flyout menu
Custom actions are disabled in toolbar.

"Custom actions are enabled in toolbar.
Press and hold the More button to show the Custom actions dialog."

"Fullscreen seek swipe is enabled.
Seek the video by swiping horizontally on the top half of the screen."

"Fullscreen speed swipe is enabled.
Adjust speed by swiping horizontally on the bottom half of the screen."
Wide search bar is disabled in the You tab.

"Wide search bar is enabled in the You tab.
To access settings, please use the following path: You tab → View channel → Menu → Settings"
Do not enter fullscreen mode when the video starts.

"Enter fullscreen mode when the video starts.
Limitation: Does not work if the player is minimized, in PiP mode, or in the background."
Enter fullscreen mode when video starts
Exit fullscreen mode at end of video
Package name of your installed external downloader app, such as NewPipe or YTDLnis, on long press.
Long press video downloader package name
Gemini API Key not set in ReVanced Extended settings.
No raw transcription data to parse
Enable \"Display over other apps\" to show as subtitles
The font size of the transcribed video subtitles. To hide subtitle box, just tap on it.
Displays the optimization dialog for GMSCore at each application startup.
Gradient start and end positions from 0 to 1 separated by comma.

Filter if matches.

To hide the \'Get YouTube Premium\' menu, you can only use \'Get YouTube Premium\' as keywords.

Filter if contains.

To hide the \'Get YouTube Premium\' menu, you can use \'YouTube Premium\' or \'Premium\' as keywords.

"Action buttons are hidden by identifier filter.
Info: • Right action buttons are hidden. • Hiding action buttons leaves empty space."

"Action buttons are hidden by index.
Info: • Wrong action buttons may be hidden, or action buttons may not be hidden. • Hiding action buttons leaves no empty space."
AI-generated video summary section is shown.
AI-generated video summary section is hidden.

Filter if matches.

To hide the \'Play next in queue\' menu, you can only use \'Play next in queue\' as keywords.

Filter if contains.

To hide the \'Play next in queue\' menu, you can use \'Play next\' or \'in queue\' as keywords.

Surrounding a keyword/phrase with double-quotes will prevent partial matches of video titles and channel names.

For example,
\"ai\" will hide the video: How does AI work?
but will not hide: What does fair use mean?
Chapter labels next to the seekbar are shown.
Chapter labels next to the seekbar are hidden.
Billing and payments menu is shown.
Billing and payments menu is hidden.
Try experimental new features menu is shown.
Try experimental new features menu is hidden.
Hide Try experimental new features menu
Purchases and memberships menu is shown.
Purchases and memberships menu is hidden.
Your data in YouTube menu is shown.
Your data in YouTube menu is hidden.
Disabled comments button or with label \"0\" is shown.
Disabled comments button or with label \"0\" is hidden.
"Floating buttons like 'Use this sound' are shown in the Shorts channel tab."
"Floating buttons like 'Use this sound' are hidden in the Shorts channel tab."

"Hidden in channel.
Info: • Only shelves with the Shorts header on the home tab are hidden."
Use this sound button is shown.
Use this sound button is hidden.

"YouTube Doodles show up a few days each year.
If a YouTube Doodle is currently showing in your region and this setting is on, the filter bar below the search bar will also be hidden."
Theme of the snack bar is not inverted.
Theme of the snack bar is inverted.
Videos play in portrait mode after turning the screen off and on.
Videos continue to play in landscape mode after turning the screen off and on.
Opens links in the in-app browser.
Opens links in the external browser.
Do not open Shorts in the regular player.
Open Shorts in the regular player.
Instead of launching an external downloader, open the queue manager.

"Parsing the video may take a while depending on its length. Transcribing long videos may exceed Gemini's limits.
AI-generated responses may contain inaccurate information.
Tap here to get an API key."

"Tap to summarize the video. Tap and hold to transcribe.
Summarized and transcribed results are saved unless you closed the app or used Gemini on another video. Tap the button again to view results."
Unable to generate playlist due to channel id mismatch.
Native video download button opens your external downloader.
Native video download button opens the queue manager.
Hide or change components related to snack bar.
Spoof the streaming data to prevent playback issues.
Add to queue and open queue
Add to queue and play video
Add to queue and reload video
Remove from queue and open queue
Remove from queue and reload video

"Instead of opening an external downloader, open the queue manager dialog.
You can also open the queue manager by pressing and holding the back button on the navigation bar.
This feature is still in progress, so most features may not work.
Please use it for debugging purposes only."
A toast will not be shown when changing the default playback speed.
A toast will be shown when changing the default playback speed.
Playback speed changes only apply to the current Short.

"Playback speed changes apply to all Shorts.
Info: • The only way to change the playback speed in the Shorts player is to use the 'Speed ​​dialog' in 'Custom actions'. • If you didn't include the 'Shorts components' patch, this wouldn't be available."
Remember playback speed changes on Shorts
A toast will not be shown when changing the default playback speed on Shorts.
A toast will be shown when changing the default playback speed on Shorts.
Changed default Shorts playback speed to: %s.
A toast will not be shown when changing the default video quality.
A toast will be shown when changing the default video quality.
Quality changes only apply to the current Short.
Quality changes apply to all Shorts.
A toast will not be shown when changing the default Shorts quality.
A toast will be shown when changing the default Shorts quality.
Old player layout is not used.
"Old player layout is used. No margins on top and bottom of player."

"A YouTube Data API v3 Developer Key is required to replace handles with usernames.
The daily quota for API keys on the free plan is 10,000, and 1 quota is used to replace a handle with a username for 1 comment.
Click to see how to issue an API key."
The developer key for using the YouTube Data API v3.

1. Go to Create a new project.
2. Click the CREATE button.
3. Go to YouTube Data API v3.
4. Click the ENABLE button.
5. Click the CREATE CREDENTIALS button.
6. Select the Public data option.
7. Click the NEXT button.
8. Copy the API key.

※ API key should never be shared with others, so it is not included in Import / Export settings.
Issue YouTube Data API v3 developer key
"Phrases like '#', 'Fundraiser', 'Shop' and 'products' are hidden from the video subtitles."
Adjust: Mark Start and End Time for segment
Tap here to view your segments.

"This feature is still experimental, so there is no guarantee that it will work perfectly.
Most bugs cannot be fixed due to client-side limitations, so use it only for testing purposes."

"This feature is still experimental, so there is no guarantee that it will work perfectly.
Most bugs cannot be fixed due to client-side limitations, so use it only for testing purposes."
Copy video URL menu is hidden.
Copy video URL menu is shown.
Copy timestamp URL menu is hidden.
Copy timestamp URL menu is shown.

Playback speed menu is hidden.

Info:
• Shorts default playback speed should be enabled.
• The selected speed will be applied to the next video.

Playback speed menu is shown.

Info:
• Shorts default playback speed should be enabled.
• The selected speed will be applied to the next video.
Configure the height percentage of the empty space left when the navigation bar is hidden, between 0 and 100 (%).
19.13.37 - Restore old style Rolling number animations
Could not fetch any client streams.
You may not be logged in.
Video codec is forced to AVC (H.264).

"Enabling this might improve battery life and fix playback stuttering.
AVC has a maximum resolution of 1080p, Opus audio codec is not available, and video playback will use more internet data than VP9 or AV1."
"• Audio track menu is missing. • Stable volume is not available. • Disable forced auto audio tracks is not available. • Kids videos may not play when logged out or in incognito mode."
"• Audio track menu is missing. • Stable volume is not available."
"• Audio track menu is missing. • Stable volume is not available."
• There may be playback issues (PoToken required).
"• Videos may end 1 second early. • OPUS audio codec may not be supported."
• Whole ASNs/IP ranges may be blocked by the server.
"• Stable volume is not available. • Movies or paid videos may not play. • Kids videos may not play when logged out or in incognito mode."

"Do not skip Onesie response encryption.
• Some users may experience a new type of playback issue."

"Skip Onesie response encryption.
• Fixes a new type of playback issue that some users are experiencing. • AV1 codec may not be available."
Client used to fetch streaming data is hidden in Stats for nerds.
Client used to fetch streaming data is shown in Stats for nerds.
"Streaming data is not spoofed. Video playback may not work."
iOS client not added to available clients.

"iOS client added to available clients.
WARNING: iOS client is deprecated. Any issues that arise while using it are at your own risk."

"When requesting YouTube API endpoints using iOS, you will need the Auth tokens issued by the iOS device and the PoTokens issued by iOSGuard.
This means that streaming requests via iOS will be missing both the Auth tokens and the PoTokens, and the server may consider the user as a bot and block the entire ASN/IP range.
USE AT YOUR OWN RISK!"
Turning off this setting may cause video playback issues.
Brightness swipe sensitivity must be between 1-1000 (%).
Configure the minimum distance for brightness swiping between 1 and 1000 (%).\nThe shorter the minimum distance, the faster the brightness level changes.
Seek swipe sensitivity must be between 1-1000 (%).
Configure the minimum distance for seek swiping between 1 and 1000 (%).
Speed swipe sensitivity must be between 1-1000 (%).
Configure the minimum distance for speed swiping between 1 and 1000 (%).
The seek swipe gesture zone is at the top, the speed zone is at the bottom.
The speed swipe gesture zone is at the top, the seek zone is at the bottom.
Volume swipe sensitivity must be between 1-1000 (%).

Configure the minimum distance for volume swiping between 1 and 1000 (%).

The shorter the minimum distance, the faster the volume level changes.

Recommended volume swipe sensitivity is 100% at 15-volume steps and 10% at 150-volume steps.
"• Follows the watch history settings of Google account. • Watch history may not work due to DNS or VPN."
• Follows the watch history settings of Google account.
Internal Error: Chosen track has no URL
Internal error: Failed to get final subtitles
Unsupported language selected: %s. Please choose \'ru\' or \'en\'.
Yandex can transcribe videos from any language, but the output is available only in English (en) and Russian (ru).
Use Yandex transcription instead of Gemini. Yandex is faster. Only English and Russian are supported. No API key is required.
